trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Huntington
There was one other sighting in Huntington on or around October 8th 2013
Summary: same sighting and time of sighting as reported on 10-7-13
divs: Sighting Detailsthis thing was in the sky at the same time, same area, heading in the same direction as reported from the first sighting report on 10-7-13. this sighting on 10-8-13 behaved in the same way, moving VERY slowly in the sky. This WAS NOT part of the meteorite shower. I took more video of it, but did not post because it was very similar to the footage from the first sighting (that I summited yesterday).
